name: TamagoCity 2029
description:
Tamagocity 2029 - for LOWREZJAM 2020

You are in control of your city. Keep it alive by choosing what to build, where. Watch as it evolves over time. Do dodgy deals with backstreet vendors. Will you make a pleasant paradise or a sci-fi slum?

Click the main HUD for menu :)

All mouse controls
